body_html: @aidan-plenert-macdonald it seems like "custom hardware for TF" is in a weird category of being encouraged, yet requiring hacks/unofficial APIs. Bigger players like Qualcomm/Intel work in a partnernship with Google, so they have a direct channel to the development team. Not sure what the plans are for other 3rd party developers cc @vrv @tatatodd
